attr.title: Super Dungeon Muncher
attr.desc: Super Dungeon Muncher combines puzzles and rogue-like action with a unique twist. The Muncher chases you in real time as you progress through the world. Act fast and think quick or the Muncher will get you.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://n-nexy.itch.io/super-dungeon-muncher and extract it. Put the data.win from the extracted folder into your ports/superdungeonmuncher folder.
